text: George Lopez is an American television sitcom that ran on the American Broadcasting Company (ABC) from March 27, 2002, to May 8, 2007, broadcasting a total of 120 episodes over six seasons. == Series overview == ==Episodes== === Season 1 (2002) === === Season 2 (2002–03) === === Season 3 (2003–04) === === Season 4 (2004–05) === === Season 5 (2005–06) === === Season 6 (2007) === ==References== ==External links== *List of George Lopez episodes at TV.com Category:Lists of American sitcom episodes
title: List of George Lopez episodes
